data.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi (2001)
data.summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

data.title: The Lion King (1994)
data.summary: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

data.title: Coco (I) (2017)
data.summary: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

data.title: Kimi no na wa. (2016)
data.summary: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

data.title: WALL·E (2008)
data.summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

data.title: Mononoke-hime (1997)
data.summary: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

data.title: Up (2009)
data.summary: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

data.title: Toy Story (1995)
data.summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

data.title: Toy Story 3 (2010)
data.summary: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

data.title: Inside Out (I) (2015)
data.summary: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

data.title: Hauru no ugoku shiro (2004)
data.summary: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

data.title: Incredibles 2 (2018)
data.summary: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for the kids while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.

data.title: Finding Nemo (2003)
data.summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

data.title: Monsters, Inc. (2001)
data.summary: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

data.title: How to Train Your Dragon (2010)
data.summary: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

data.title: Isle of Dogs (2018)
data.summary: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

data.title: The Incredibles (2004)
data.summary: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

data.title: Aladdin (1992)
data.summary: When a street urchin vies for the love of a beautiful princess, he uses a genie's magic power to make himself off as a prince in order to marry her.

data.title: Zootopia (2016)
data.summary: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

data.title: Ratatouille (2007)
data.summary: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

data.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993)
data.summary: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

data.title: Beauty and the Beast (1991)
data.summary: A selfish prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

data.title: Shrek (2001)
data.summary: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, Shrek agrees to rescue Princess Fiona for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.

data.title: Paddington 2 (2017)
data.summary: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

data.title: Toy Story 2 (1999)
data.summary: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

data.title: Pâfekuto burû (1997)
data.summary: A retired pop singer turned actress' sense of reality is shaken when she is stalked by an obsessed fan and seemingly a ghost of her past.

data.title: Big Hero 6 (2014)
data.summary: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

data.title: Tangled (2010)
data.summary: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

data.title: The Lego Movie (2014)
data.summary: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

data.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2 (2014)
data.summary: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

data.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox (2009)
data.summary: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

data.title: Loving Vincent (2017)
data.summary: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

data.title: Kubo and the Two Strings (2016)
data.summary: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

data.title: Christopher Robin (2018)
data.summary: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

data.title: Wreck-It Ralph (2012)
data.summary: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

data.title: Coraline (2009)
data.summary: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

data.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit (1988)
data.summary: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

data.title: Moana (I) (2016)
data.summary: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

data.title: The Little Mermaid (1989)
data.summary: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.

data.title: Mulan (1998)
data.summary: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

data.title: Kung Fu Panda (2008)
data.summary: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance: However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a tyro in martial arts.

data.title: The Jungle Book (1967)
data.summary: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

data.title: Frozen (I) (2013)
data.summary: When the newly-crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

data.title: Ice Age (2002)
data.summary: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

data.title: Despicable Me 2 (2013)
data.summary: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

data.title: Finding Dory (2016)
data.summary: The friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, Dory, begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

data.title: Hercules (1997)
data.summary: The son of the Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

data.title: The Lego Batman Movie (2017)
data.summary: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

data.title: The Emperor's New Groove (2000)
data.summary: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

data.title: Monsters University (2013)
data.summary: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

data.title: Megamind (2010)
data.summary: The supervillain Megamind finally defeats his nemesis, the superhero Metro Man. But without a hero, he loses all purpose and must find new meaning to his life.

data.title: Shrek 2 (2004)
data.summary: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

data.title: Lilo & Stitch (2002)
data.summary: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive.

data.title: A Bug's Life (1998)
data.summary: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

data.title: Tarzan (1999)
data.summary: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

data.title: Sing (2016)
data.summary: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists' find that their lives will never be the same.

data.title: Cars (2006)
data.summary: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

data.title: Hotel Transylvania (2012)
data.summary: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

data.title: Brave (2012)
data.summary: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

data.title: Enchanted (2007)
data.summary: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

data.title: The Princess and the Frog (2009)
data.summary: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

data.title: Kung Fu Panda 3 (2016)
data.summary: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.

data.title: Next Gen (I) (2018)
data.summary: A friendship with a top-secret robot turns a lonely girl's life into a thrilling adventure as they take on bullies, evil bots and a scheming madman.

data.title: Bolt (2008)
data.summary: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

data.title: Madagascar (2005)
data.summary: Spoiled by their upbringing and unaware of what wildlife really is, four animals from the New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar.

data.title: Rio (2011)
data.summary: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

data.title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies (2018)
data.summary: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

data.title: Cars 3 (2017)
data.summary: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

data.title: Storks (2016)
data.summary: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to packages. But when an order for a baby appears, the best delivery stork must scramble to fix the error by delivering the baby.

data.title: Ferdinand (2017)
data.summary: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

data.title: Pocahontas (1995)
data.summary: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

data.title: Peter Rabbit (2018)
data.summary: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

data.title: Trolls (2016)
data.summary: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

data.title: The Secret Life of Pets (2016)
data.summary: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

data.title: Minions (2015)
data.summary: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

data.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation (2018)
data.summary: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

data.title: The Boss Baby (2017)
data.summary: A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby pairs up with his 7-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.

data.title: Despicable Me 3 (2017)
data.summary: Gru meets his long-lost charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

data.title: Angry Birds (2016)
data.summary: Find out why the birds are so angry. When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.

data.title: Shrek Forever After (2010)
data.summary: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.

data.title: Sausage Party (2016)
data.summary: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

data.title: Cars 2 (2011)
data.summary: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

data.title: Luis and His Friends from Outer Space (2018)
data.summary: An 11-year-old boy befriends three aliens after they crash their UFO into his house.

data.title: Shrek the Third (2007)
data.summary: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

data.title: Ice Age: Collision Course (2016)
data.summary: Manny, Diego, and Sid join up with Buck to fend off a meteor strike that would destroy the world.

data.title: Sherlock Gnomes (2018)
data.summary: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo & Juliet, recruit renowned detective Sherlock Gnomes to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

data.title: The Emoji Movie (2017)
data.summary: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

data.title: Ralph Breaks the Internet (2018)
data.summary: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

data.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)
data.summary: Spider-Man crosses parallel dimensions and teams up with the Spider-Men of those dimensions to stop a threat to all reality.

data.title: Smallfoot (2018)
data.summary: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as "humans" really do exist.

data.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World (2019)
data.summary: Continues the adventure of Hiccup and his dragon Toothless.

data.title: Detective Pikachu (2019)
data.summary: Feature film based on the popular Nintendo game, Pokemon.

data.title: The Lion King (2019)
data.summary: CGI and live-action re-imagining of the 1994 Disney classic.

data.title: Dumbo (2019)
data.summary: A young elephant, whose oversized ears enable him to fly, helps save a struggling circus. But when the circus plans a new venture, Dumbo and his friends discover dark secrets beneath its shiny veneer.

data.title: The Grinch (2018)
data.summary: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

data.title: Doragon bôru chô: Burorî - Dragon Ball Super: Broly (2018)
data.summary: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

data.title: Toy Story 4 (2019)
data.summary: Woody and Buzz embark on a quest to find Woody's romantic interest, Bo Peep.

data.title: Sonic the Hedgehog (2019)
data.summary: A cop in rural town of Green Hills will help Sonic escape from the goverment who is looking to capture him.

data.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019)
data.summary: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: LEGO DUPLO® invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

data.title: The Addams Family (2019)
data.summary: An animated version of Charles Addams' series of cartoons about a peculiar, ghoulish family.
